name: pnet-tool
description: Electron 桌面端的 PNETLab Telnet 客户端，集成健康探测与协议处理自动化
author: YangYuS8

scripts.dev:desktop: pnpm run build:electron && pnpm exec concurrently -k "pnpm run dev" "pnpm run watch:electron" "pnpm run launch:electron"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:renderer && pnpm run build:electron
scripts.build:renderer: pnpm run clean:renderer && PNET_ELECTRON_EXPORT=1 pnpm exec next build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join('out');const dest=path.join('dist-electron','renderer');if(!fs.existsSync(src)){throw new Error('Next export output not found: '+src);}fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});"
scripts.launch:electron: pnpm exec wait-on tcp:3000 file:dist-electron/main.js && pnpm exec electron dist-electron/main.js
scripts.dist:appimage: pnpm run build && pnpm exec electron-builder --linux AppImage --publish never
scripts.dist:win: pnpm run build && pnpm exec electron-builder --win nsis --x64 --publish never
